tag.name: resourceLifecycleProjectOptOutType
tag.desc: Resource Lifecycle Project level opt out of scheduled downtime.

all.desc: Opt Out across all resource types in scope of scheduled downtime

optin.desc: Opt Back in across all resource types in scope of scheduled downtime

cloudsql.desc: Opt Out cloud sql instances from scheduled downtime scope

GCE.desc: Opt Out GCE instances from scheduled downtime scope

GCS.desc: Opt Out GCS instances from retention and lifecycle settings

optout.desc: Opt Out across all resource types in scope of scheduled downtime

tag.name: resourceLifecycleOptOut
tag.desc: Resource Lifecycle level opt out of scheduled downtime.

resource-outofscope.desc: When set to true, instance/resource will be opted out of scheduled downtime.

resource-inscope.desc: When set to false, instance/resource will be part of scheduled downtime.

tag.name: resourceLifecycleFolderOptOut
tag.desc: Resource Lifecycle folder level override opt out of scheduled downtime.

folderoutofscope.desc: When set to true, folder will be opted out of scheduled downtime.

folderinscope.desc: When set to false, folder will be part of scheduled downtime.
